description:
Merging multiple arrays into a single array.

For example, let's say you have multiple arrays:
```json
[ 1, 2, 3 ], [ 4, 5, 6 ], [ 7, 8, 9 ]
```

Their elements can be combined into a single array to show simultaneously:
```json
[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9]
```

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/5gzayPK_3tz4vn)
shortDescription: Merging multiple arrays into a single array.
